description: Create, update, and delete short links effortlessly with this server. Integrate seamlessly with AI assistants to manage your Dub.co links through a standardized interface. Enhance your link management experience with powerful tools at your fingertips.

dubcoApiKey.description: Your Dub.co API key, obtainable from the Dub.co dashboard.

capabilities.name: create_link
capabilities.description: Create a new short link on dub.co, asking the user which domain to use

capabilities.name: update_link
capabilities.description: Update an existing short link on dub.co

capabilities.name: delete_link
capabilities.description: Delete a short link on dub.co
